languages.text: "Шепотки сказали за Арлекином идти, а теперь ехидничают, смеются, будто пошутили удачно".

traits.locale_text: "Шепотки сказали за Арлекином идти, а теперь ехидничают, смеются, будто пошутили удачно".

languages.text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."
languages.original_text: "Шепотки сказали за Арлекином идти, а теперь ехидничают, смеются, будто пошутили удачно".

traits.locale_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just made a good joke."
"The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just made a good joke."
"The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just made a good joke."
"The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just made a good joke."
"The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."
"The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

languages.text: « Les murmures m'ont dit de suivre l'Arlequin, et maintenant, ils ricanent comme s'ils m'avaient joué un tour pendable. »
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: « Les murmures m'ont dit de suivre l'arlequin, et maintenant, ils ricanent comme s'ils m'avaient joué un sale tour. »

languages.text: “那些低语的声音让我跟着那个丑角走，现在它们都在窃笑，就好像它们和我开了个滑稽的玩笑一样。”
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: “那些低语的声音让我跟着那个丑角走，现在它们都在窃笑，就好像它们开了个有趣的玩笑一样。”

languages.text: 「ささやき声たちがハーレクィンを追うように言ったのよ。それなのに、今はまるで冗談を言ったみたいにクスクス笑ってるの」
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: 「ささやき声たちがハーレクィンを追うように言ったのよ。それなのに、今はまるで冗談を言ったみたいにクスクス笑ってるの」

languages.text: "Das Flüstern sagte mir, ich solle dem Harlekin folgen und jetzt kichern sie alle, als hätten sie mir einen Streich gespielt."
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: "Das Geflüster verriet mir, dass ich dem Harlekin folgen sollte und jetzt herrscht nur noch Gekicher, als hätten gerade jemand einen guten Witz gerissen."

languages.text: «Los susurros me dijeron que siguiera al Arlequín, y ahora se ríen como si me hubieran gastado una broma estupenda».
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: «Los susurros me dijeron que siguiera al Arlequín, y ahora todos se ríen como si me hubieran gastado una broma».

languages.text: "Fısıltılar bana Arleken'i takip etmemi söylemişti. Şimdi de hepsi komik bir şaka yapmış gibi bana kıs kıs gülüyor."
languages.original_text: "The whispers told me to follow the Harlequin, and now they're all snickering like they just played a hilarious joke on me."

traits.locale_text: "Fısıltılar bana Arleken'i takip etmemi söylemişti ama şimdi hepsi bana komik bir şaka yapmışçasına kıs kıs gülüyor."
